author: elena
msg: Add new internal property: namespace-context that represent a shared namespace
context between all the components. This property is reset by a configuration just before
parse and is queried by all components.
Note: this property MUST be set by the configuration.
The private copies of the namespace support are removed.

author: neilg
msg: fixing bug 11989.  Now entities in the entity manager
know whether they were declared in the internal or external subset.

author: neilg
msg: propagate change to improve processing of long comments to the experimental

author: sandygao
msg: Modified the identity constraint code so that it doesn't depend on PSVI.

author: elena
msg: The NonValidatingParserConfiguration now uses optimazed scanner (that binds namespaces).
This commit also re-organizes some configuration code.
